description:
Kurokan calls Koshimizu a low-life reporter who gets so angry and wants to use the press to completely destroy him. 
Meanwhile, Kurokan publicly tells the press that Sakamoto is being paid to play baseball which attracts many reporters to the school. 
Kurokan and Sakamoto show the training to them which is then covered in the newspapers and attracts many viewers. 
In order to catch Sakamoto`s super-fastballs, Kurokan needs to help the catcher overcome his fear for fastballs.
Source: crunchyroll
